price: Dájúdájú àwọn ẹrúsìn Mi, kò sí agbára kan fún ọ lórí wọn, àyàfi ẹni tí ó bá tẹ̀lé ọ nínú àwọn ẹni anù.
arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَاوِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna ʿibādī laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'ṭānun illā mani ittabaʿaka mina al-ghāwīna
